009package ImageJ_Demos;
010
011import java.awt.Point;
012
013import ij.ImagePlus;
014import ij.gui.Roi;
015import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
016import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
017
018/**
019 * This ImageJ plugin shows processing the inside of 
020 * the currently selected region of interest (ROI)
021 * using the {@link Point} iterator of {@link Roi}. 
022 * The plugin works for RGB color images and merely inverts the
023 * each pixel contained in the ROI.
024 * 
025 * @author WB
026 * @version 2022/04/01
027 */
028public class Roi_Processing_Demo2 implements PlugInFilter {
029
030        private ImagePlus im;
031
032        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
033                this.im = im;
034                return DOES_8G + ROI_REQUIRED;
035        }
036
037        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
038                Roi roi = im.getRoi();
039                
040                // Use Roi's Point iterator to visit all contained pixels:
041                for (Point pnt : roi) {
042                        int p = ip.getPixel(pnt.x, pnt.y);
043                        ip.putPixel(pnt.x, pnt.y, ~p);  // invert color values
044                }
045
046        }
047}
